wikipedia_page.main: William James Nye,  (born 28 March 1966) is a British courtier and civil servant. Since December 2015, he has been Secretary-General of the Archbishops' Council and Secretary General of the General Synod of the Church of England. From 2011 to 2015, he served as Principal Private Secretary to Charles, Prince of Wales and Camilla, Duchess of Cornwall.

response: * William Nye (official) (born 1966), Secretary-General of the Archbishops' Council
* William Nigh (1881–1955), American filmmaker, sometimes credited as "William Nye"
